previous.excerpt: A new release from the Artify crew featuring 5000+ unique illustrations available for download in high quality PNG files as well as vector sources, there are over 70 illustration styles from high quality 3D styles to minimalistic and abstract lines!
previous.title: Artify Illustrations - Search and download more than 5000 vector illustrations

localize.description: 在Artify Crew的新版本中，有5000多幅独特的插图可供高质量的PNG文件和矢量源下载，有70多种插图样式，从高质量的3D样式到简约和抽象的线条！
localize.tagline: 搜索并下载5000多幅矢量插图

localize.description: 在Artify Crew的新版本中，有5000多幅獨特的插圖可供高質量的PNG文件和矢量源下載，有70多種插圖樣式，從高質量的3D樣式到簡約和抽象的線條！
localize.tagline: 搜索並下載5000多幅矢量插圖

next.excerpt: Ratio is an Android home screen designed to turn mindless distraction into mindful productivity. 3 screens with everything you need on unlock. No more endless switching between apps, use social media less and supercharge your productivity.
next.title: Ratio 4 - Welcome to your new home screen

localize.description: Ratio是一款Android主屏幕，旨在将无意识的分心工作转化为专注的工作效率。3个屏幕，解锁时有您需要的一切。不再在应用程序之间没完没了地切换，减少使用社交媒体，提高您的工作效率。
localize.tagline: 欢迎使用您的新主屏幕

localize.description: Ratio是一款Android主屏幕，旨在將無意識的分心工作轉化爲專注的工作效率。3個屏幕，解鎖時有您需要的一切。不再在應用程序之間沒完沒了地切換，減少使用社交媒體，提高您的工作效率。
localize.tagline: 歡迎使用您的新主屏幕
